SEARCH
Module group75
Package model.pet

Class Pet

java.lang.Object
model.pet.Pet
Direct Known Subclasses:
Dog, Fish, Monkey, Mouse
public abstract class Pet extends Object
This is an abstract pet class which represents a generic pet in the game. Pets have stats representing their health, happiness, sleep, hunger, and space readiness. A pet will be in one of the following states at all times: normal, sleeping, hungry, angry, dead.

    • goOnSpaceMission

      public boolean goOnSpaceMission()
      Makes the pet go on a space mission as long as the pet is ready for a space mission.

      After the mission, the pet's space readiness will be reset, their stats will be effected, and their number of missions will be incremented.

      Returns:
      true if the pet successfull went to space and false otherwise.

    • isSpaceReady

      public boolean isSpaceReady()
      Checks if the pet is space ready.

      A pet is ready for space if their space readiness is greater than or equal to 100 and their current state is normal.

      Returns:
      true if the pet is space ready and false otherwise.

    • isInState

      public boolean isInState(Pet.PetState state)
      Check if the pet is in the specified state.
      Parameters:
      state - the state to check against the pet's state.
      Returns:
      true if the specified state is the pet's current state and false otherwise.
